name: Driving Army Cargo US
description:
Get ready for an adventurous free army base coach driving game.Driving Army Cargo US has all like army truck game.
How To Play game:
• Pick your favourite army truck.
• Press Gas button to speed up and move forward.
• Press brake to stop heavy army truck.
• Press Reverse button to move back your truck
• Use left or right button to turn you vehicles.
